simplesect.title: Logstore destination
simplesect.para: The logstore() destination that was available only in &abbrev; version 6 is now available in version 7.0.7, allowing you to store messages in encrypted files.

simplesect.title: Password-protected private keys
simplesect.para: Starting with &abbrev; version 3.147.0.7, you can use password-protected private keys in the network() and syslog() source and destination drivers.
